items.title: Awesome Privacy
items.content_text:
### ChatGPT

*   [Jan (‚≠ê35k)](https://github.com/janhq/jan) - Jan is an open source alternative to ChatGPT that runs 100% offline on your computer.

### Copilot

*   [Continue (‚≠ê28k)](https://github.com/continuedev/continue) - Open-source autopilot for VS Code and JetBrains‚Äîthe easiest way to code with any LLM
*   [Localpilot (‚≠ê3.4k)](https://github.com/danielgross/localpilot) - Use GitHub Copilot locally on your Macbook with one-click.
*   [Turbopilot (‚≠ê3.8k)](https://github.com/ravenscroftj/turbopilot) - \[Archived] Turbopilot is an open source large-language-model based code completion engine that runs locally on CPU.
items.content_html:
ChatGPT

  • Jan (‚≠ê35k) - Jan is an open source alternative to ChatGPT that runs 100% offline on your computer.

Copilot

  • Continue (‚≠ê28k) - Open-source autopilot for VS Code and JetBrains‚Äîthe easiest way to code with any LLM
  • Localpilot (‚≠ê3.4k) - Use GitHub Copilot locally on your Macbook with one-click.
  • Turbopilot (‚≠ê3.8k) - [Archived] Turbopilot is an open source large-language-model based code completion engine that runs locally on CPU.

items.title: ALL About RSS
items.content_text:

*   [ÊúüÂæÖÔºàAngeliaÔºâ](https://angelia.codeeer.com/) <sup>[185](https://t.me/s/aboutrss/185), [305](https://t.me/s/aboutrss/305)</sup> [![iOS](https://github.com/AboutRSS/ALL-about-RSS/raw/master/media/icons8-iphone-16.png)](https://apps.apple.com/app/%E6%9C%9F%E5%BE%85/id1461503931)![Online](https://github.com/AboutRSS/ALL-about-RSS/raw/master/media/icons8-web-design-16.png)

items.title: Awesome Ai4lam
items.content_text:
### Learning Resources / Computer vision

*   [Computer Vision for Heritage Collections](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1FpKfX4hI38ZKG81osa3bXgitEArxK45NKmT6NOyrnJk) ‚Äì French-language 2‚ÄØhr workshop designed to introduce computer vision applications to cultural heritage professionals

### Conferences and Workshops / Upcoming Conferences and Workshops

*   [BitCurator Forum](https://bitcuratorconsortium.org/forum) ‚Äì Mar. 19‚Äì22 virtual event on digital forensics, digital archives, and related digital analysis workflows
*   [Digital Library Federation (DLF) 2024 Forum](https://forum2024.diglib.org) ‚Äì Jul. 29‚Äì31 at Michigan State U., East Lansing, Michigan, USA.
items.content_html:
Learning Resources / Computer vision

  • Computer Vision for Heritage Collections ‚Äì French-language 2‚ÄØhr workshop designed to introduce computer vision applications to cultural heritage professionals

Conferences and Workshops / Upcoming Conferences and Workshops

  • Digital Library Federation (DLF) 2024 Forum ‚Äì Jul. 29‚Äì31 at Michigan State U., East Lansing, Michigan, USA.
